overview: Tanya, a lesbian sculptor living in Seattle hasn't seen her sister for over 10 years. When Ramona suddenly appears on her doorstep suitcase in hand the reception isn't a warm one. Tanya's male roommate Bold attempts to bring them together. Through a series of 'Therapy Sessions' with Bold, they begin to open up and rediscover the value of sisterly love.
title: 27 Pieces of Me
